verses.verse: <S%H5315><s%>"'If anyone <S%H2398>sins,<s%> in that he <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H423>adjuration,<s%> he being a <S%H5707>witness,<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> he has <S%H7200>seen<s%> or <S%H3045>known,<s%> if he <S%H5046>doesn't<s%> report <S%H5375>it,<s%> then he shall bear his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

<S%H5315><s%>"'Or if anyone <S%H5060>touches<s%> any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> whether it is the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H2416>animal,<s%> or the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>livestock,<s%> or the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> creeping <S%H8318>things,<s%> and it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from <S%H2931>him,<s%> and he is unclean, then he shall be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

<S%H5060><s%>"'Or if he touches the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> whatever his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> is with which he is <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from <S%H3045>him;<s%> when he knows of <S%H816>it,<s%> then he shall be guilty.

<S%H5315><s%>"'Or if anyone <S%H7650>swears<s%> <S%H981>rashly<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil,<s%> or to do <S%H3190>good,<s%> whatever it is that a <S%H120>man<s%> might utter <S%H981>rashly<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath,<s%> and it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from <S%H3045>him;<s%> when he knows of <S%H816>it,<s%> then he shall be guilty of one of <S%H259>these.<s%>
It shall <S%H816>be,<s%> when he is guilty of <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H3034>these,<s%> he shall confess that in which he has <S%H2398>sinned:<s%>

and he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> a <S%H5347>female<s%> from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> a <S%H3776>lamb<s%> or <S%H8166>a<s%> <S%H8166>goat,<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him concerning his <S%H2403>sin.<s%>

<S%H3027><s%>"'If he <S%H1767>can't<s%> afford <S%H5060>a<s%> <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> then <S%H3027>he<s%> shall <S%H5060>bring<s%> his <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering <S%H854>for<s%> that in which he has <S%H8147>sinned,<s%> two <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who shall first <S%H7126>offer<s%> the one which is for the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> <S%H7223>and<s%> wring <S%H4454>off<s%> its <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H4136>from<s%> its <S%H6203>neck,<s%> but shall not sever it <S%H914>completely.<s%>

He shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> on the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and the <S%H7604>rest<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be drained <S%H4680>out<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> It is a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

He shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him concerning his <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and he shall be <S%H5545>forgiven.<s%>

<S%H3027><s%>"'But if he <S%H5381>can't<s%> afford <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> for that in which he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%> He shall <S%H7760>put<s%> no <S%H8081>oil<s%> on <S%H5414>it,<s%> neither shall he put any <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on <S%H2403>it,<s%> for it is a sin offering.

He shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7061>take<s%> his <S%H4393>handful<s%> of it as the <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H6999>portion,<s%> and burn it on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> on the offerings of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire.<s%> It is a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him concerning his <S%H2403>sin<s%> that he has <S%H2398>sinned<s%> in <S%H259>any<s%> of these <S%H5545>things,<s%> and he will be forgiven; and the rest shall be the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s, as the meal <S%H4503>offering.<s%>'"

"If <S%H5315>anyone<s%> <S%H4603>commits<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass,<s%> and <S%H4604>sins<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly,<s%> in the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> in <S%H3701>silver<s%> by <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%>

He shall make <S%H7999>restitution<s%> for that which he has done <S%H2398>wrong<s%> in the holy <S%H6944>thing,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> a fifth <S%H2549>part<s%> to <S%H5414>it,<s%> and give it to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him with the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and he will be <S%H5545>forgiven.<s%>

"If <S%H5315>anyone<s%> <S%H2398>sins,<s%> and <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of the things which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done;<s%> though he <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know <S%H816>it,<s%> yet he is guilty, and shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> from of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him concerning the <S%H7684>thing<s%> in which he <S%H7683>sinned<s%> and <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know <S%H5545>it,<s%> and he will be forgiven.
It is a trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%> He is <S%H816>certainly<s%> <S%H816>guilty<s%> before <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
